attributes.action: Let the public have a vote to see if the death penalty should be reintroduced.
attributes.additional_details: People lives are being ended without any remorse in a blink of an eyelid, This is getting beyond the joke the safety of people should be the priority. It seems criminals have more rights than victims in today's society as this country has a soft touch for criminals..
attributes.background: Let the public have a vote to see if the death penalty should be reintroduced for serious offences ( such as killing a child)

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602435
